amendatorysection.para: Proceedings under section 9-353 shall be subject to and governed by the district court civil procedure statutes. Issues properly raised shall be tried and determined as in other civil actions in equity. All orders, judgments, and decrees rendered may be reviewed as other orders, judgments, and decrees.

crossreference.para: Appeals, procedure, see section 25-1901 et seq.
Civil procedure statutes, see section 25-101 et seq.
